meanings.sent1: The old sweater was holey, with many gaps in the fabric.
meanings.sent2: The sieve was holey, allowing the water to pass through easily.
meanings.sent3: The holey bucket leaked water everywhere, making a mess.
meanings.sent4: The fence was so holey that even the smallest animals could escape through it.
meanings.sent5: The holey net caught only a few fish, as most slipped through the gaps.

meanings.sent1: The worn-out socks were holey and needed to be replaced.
meanings.sent2: The roof was holey, letting raindrops fall inside the house.
meanings.sent3: The holey umbrella was useless in the heavy rainstorm.
meanings.sent4: The boat was so holey that it started sinking in the middle of the lake.
meanings.sent5: The holey map was missing crucial details, making navigation difficult.

meanings.sent1: The cheese was holey, with many air pockets throughout.
meanings.sent2: The sponge was holey, making it perfect for scrubbing dishes.
meanings.sent3: The holey bread was perfect for soaking up the soup.
meanings.sent4: The tree trunk was holey, with woodpecker nests scattered around.
meanings.sent5: The holey gloves were not suitable for gardening, as dirt kept getting inside.
